name: Opening Hour
description:
Control with WASD and mouse look (at first the bitsy 3d first person camera can feel pretty quirky).

Silent Hill inspired lo-fi 3D exploration. Made in bitsy 3d https://aloelazoe.itch.io/bitsy-3d

I added the bitsy source here if you are interested, paste the contents into the editor's game data window (you might have to refresh the page to load it properly).

This would really benefit from having some audio, I might look into that some time later. For now, maybe listen to some cool unaffiliated ambient music like this while playing :) https://cryochamber.bandcamp.com/album/ghosts-on-broken-pavement
